Methods

CreateRegularPolygon(float2, float, int)

Creates a regular polygon where each line segment has the same length and the angle between all edges are equal as well.

public static CGRustArray<float2> CreateRegularPolygon(float2 center, float radius, int corners)

Parameters

center float2
radius float
corners int

Returns

CGRustArray<float2>

TriangulatePolygon(CGRustArray<float2>)

Splits the polygon into triangles and returns a list of integers, where each triple forms a triangle as part of the triangulation of the polygon.

The method will return an empty array if the polygon is self-intersecting

public static CGRustArray<long> TriangulatePolygon(CGRustArray<float2> points)

Parameters

points CGRustArray<float2>

Returns

CGRustArray<long>
